Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Winning Numbers and win a prize.
landscape.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Crown symbol for an Instant Win.
landscape.text3: {instantWin10X} A 2x, 5x, or 10x Crown Symbol will multiply the prize.

portrait.text1: Match Your Numbers to Winning Numbers and win a prize.
portrait.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Crown symbol for an Instant Win.
portrait.text3: {instantWin10X} A 2x, 5x, or 10x Crown Symbol will multiply the prize.

landscape.text1: {wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus.
landscape.text2:
WHEEL BONUS – Spin the wheel. The inner wheel reveals
the prize and the outer wheel reveals the prize multiplier.

portrait.text1:
{wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger
the Wheel Bonus.
portrait.text2:
WHEEL BONUS – Spin the wheel.
The inner wheel reveals the prize and
the outer wheel reveals the prize multiplier.

landscape.text1: {collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus.
landscape.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Press the Gold Bars to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal a Gold Star to end the bonus and collect the prizes.

portrait.text1:
{collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus symbol to trigger
the Prize Bonus.
portrait.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Press the Gold Bars to
reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the
Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal a Gold Star to end the bonus
and collect the prizes.

Game.bonusInfo: FIND 3 OR MORE GOLD STARS TO WIN!
Game.collectBonusInfo:
REVEAL THE GOLD STAR
TO END THE BONUS &
COLLECT YOUR PRIZES!
